name: DeleteZoomMeetingPoll
description:
Delete a poll from a Zoom scheduled meeting.

This tool deletes a poll from a scheduled Zoom meeting. Call it when you need to remove an existing poll. Prerequisites include a Pro host user type, an enabled polling feature, and a scheduled meeting. The tool is appropriate for users with the necessary scopes for managing Zoom meeting polls.

parameters.name: meeting_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Zoom meeting. Use a long format integer as IDs can exceed 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

parameters.name: zoom_poll_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the poll to be deleted from a scheduled Zoom meeting. Required for poll deletion.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

parameters.name: meetingId
parameters.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
